lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.S. Secretary of State George Shultz forecast a golden future for the Philippines after talks on its struggle for economic recovery and its fight against communist insurgents.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Speaking at a luncheon after an hour-long meeting with President Corazon Aquino, Shultz delivered a powerful and uncompromising endorsement of the Manila government.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He praised the efforts made by the armed forces in combatting the communist insurgency, now in its 18th year, adding that Aquino was also addressing the social and economic problems fuelling the rebellion.
